sentences.en: A long scar across his cheek makes him look fiendish, but he is very good - natured.
sentences.cn: 他棉颊上的长疤令他看起来很凶恶的样子, 但是他却很善良.

sentences.en: Business competition can be fiendish at times.
sentences.cn: 商业竞争有时是很惨烈的.

sentences.en: Don't be so fiendish . A fiendish person is never welcomed.
sentences.cn: 你不要那么凶,凶横的人一向不受欢迎.

sentences.en: Heathcliff chuckled a fiendish laugh at the idea.
sentences.cn: 希斯克厉夫想到这里格格地发出一种魔鬼似的笑声.

sentences.en: I don't know why you girls get such fiendish delight in defeating men.
sentences.cn: 我不明白你们女孩为什么这么喜欢挫败男孩,很幼稚嘛.

sentences.en: Ordinary people everywhere recoil and turn away in fear from these fiendish brutes of agents.
sentences.cn: 使通国之人重足而立,侧目而视者,无过于此辈穷凶极恶之特务人员.

sentences.en: Put fiendish language translation adult language category, involving the basic operating chain.
sentences.cn: 把魔王的语言翻译成人类的语言, 涉及链表等基本操作.

sentences.en: That sounds so simple, but the ambiguity is fiendish enough to keep the hounds confused.
sentences.cn: 听起来简单, 但是这个模糊的限制性条款可以让最精明的编辑头疼不已.

sentences.en: The savages took fiendish delight in torturing their prisoners.
sentences.cn: 那些野蛮人对囚犯施刑,从中得到兽性的乐趣.

sentences.en: This was a fiendish act of wickedness.
Unlike a Barbarian , however , a fiendish rage drake is not fatigued after raging.
sentences.cn: 和野蛮人不同, 炼狱狂暴龙兽在狂暴之后不会力竭.

words.tran_cn: 恶魔似的，残忍的；极坏的

trans.tran_cn: 残酷的，刁钻的，非常不愉快的，（困难、机敏等）非常的
